author.name: Licensed by Woolworths  ©️ Dorling Kindersley Ltd

description: Try our easy to follow Cannellini & Dill Crostini recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Cannellini & Dill Crostini Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 anchovy fillets in olive oil, drained
2 small fresh mediumhot red chillies, deseeded and finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 200°C. To make the crostini, pour the olive oil over the bottom of a baking tray, then gently press the bread into the oil on both sides. Season with salt and black pepper. Bake for 1315 minutes until golden brown. Remove from the oven, and lightly rub each slice with the garlic. Set the crostini aside on a wire rack to cool.

Put the cannellini beans, dill, anchovies, chillies, and spring onions in a blender or food processor, and purée until smooth. Season with salt and black pepper, and transfer to a bowl. To serve, spoon over the crostini, drizzle with the olive oil, and sprinkle with the chopped black olives.
